results.title: [Postprandial glysemia, body weight, and cardiovascular parameters in diabetes type 2 in metformin monotherapy].
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Epidermolysa_bullosa_simplex_and_limb_girdle_muscular_dystrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535955 @@@MD-2@@@ during low-calorie diet improves @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ metabolism, by significantly decreasing the levels of total @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ and low-density lipoproteins, and lowers systolic blood pressure.
